{"inkVersion":21,"root":[[{"->":"intro"},["done",{"#f":5,"#n":"g-0"}],null],"done",{"intro":["ev",{"VAR?":"printert"},"/ev",[{"->":".^.b","c":true},{"b":["
","^Hello...","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^WE HAVE TO HAVE HER.","
","^PLEASE.","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Um.","
","^What is exactly going on here?","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^I'm not sure myself, something about causing trouble.","
","^Will you join us?","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Oh yeah sure.","
","^Wait, she is with you?","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Yeah Trixie, what you gonna do about it?","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^I'm sorry, but this won't work.","
","^Unless you would get rid of her.","
","^But that would be mean a bit mean.","
","^Maybe deserved.","
","^But mean.","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Oh, but he can't.","
","^I'm an essential member.","
","^Plus, I'm the only one with a keycard to the upper floors.","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^That's not true.","
","^I have one of those too.","
","^A non-stolen one, to be exact.","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^o","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^I don't recommend it...","
","ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^BUT I WOULD!","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^But if you would get rid of her, I could take her place.","
","ev","str","^I'll let you join and get rid of her","/str","/ev",{"*":".^.c-0","flg":20},"ev","str","^I'm keeping her","/str","/ev",{"*":".^.c-1","flg":20},{"->":"intro.5"},{"c-0":["^ ",{"->":"accept"},"
",{"#f":5}],"c-1":["^ ",{"->":"refuse"},"
",{"#f":5}]}]}],[{"->":".^.b"},{"b":["
","^Hello, who are you.","
","^Oh, and...","
","^She...","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^A simular plesure to meet you.","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^What are you doing?","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^I don't know.","
","^Something we don't want you for.","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Listen, I don't want to cause trouble.","
","^Do whatever you want.","
","^I unlocked the elevator for you.","
",{"->":"intro.5"},null]}],"nop","
",{"#f":1}],"accept":["ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Really?","
","^I thought we had a connection man!","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^I'm sorry.","
","^I'll...","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Whatever!","
","^Bye!","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str",{"x()":"remove_from_team","exArgs":1},"pop","/ev","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^I shouldn't have suggested it.","
","^But I guess I can't back up now.","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str",{"x()":"add_to_team","exArgs":1},"pop","/ev","
","ev",{"x()":"improve_morale"},"pop","/ev","
","end",{"#f":1}],"refuse":["ev","str","^printert","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"ev",{"x()":"hurt_morale"},"pop","/ev","
","^:(","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Oh, you better believe it!","
","^You ain't getting a single dolar!","
","ev","str","^replacement","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Well, I...","
","^...","
","^What?","
","^Whatever.","
","^I hope you have fun doing whatever it is you're doing.","
","ev","str","^annoying","/str","/ev",{"VAR=":"speaker","re":true},"^Oh, we will.","
","end",{"#f":1}],"global decl":["ev","str","^replacement","/str",{"VAR=":"speaker"},false,{"VAR=":"printert"},"str","^printert","/str",{"VAR=":"to_export"},"/ev","end",null],"#f":1}],"listDefs":{}}
